alert.note: Alert for Greene; Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 1:45PM CST until January 28 at 7:12PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam affecting Sumter, Marengo and Greene Counties. .Heavy rainfall is expected over the Tombigbee River basin and a flood warning is now in effect for the Tombigbee River. The next statement will be issued Wednesday evening.late tonight at 445 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON TO SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River at Gainesville Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon to Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 101.0 feet, Flooding of low lying agricultural and wooded lands in the area occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 75.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Friday afternoon to a crest of 101.8 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 101.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
